name: Gravity well (itch)
description:
Gravity well

Far, far away, in another galaxy... space and time are against you. Both are running out!  

Find a way to escape from the Black hole that is behind you! 

Get resources, upgrade your ship for Activate hyperdrive and escape. 

Good luck!

Controls:

Use the arrows for go around and collect modules for upgrade your ship.

Alt-F4 for exit the game!
